attributes.additional_details: Wootton Bassett a nice town which represents the way England is, was and should always be, that is the England our solders are proudly fighting and in sadness dying for us to keep.  Lets keep our representative town Wotton Bassett as the route for our lost gems and not accepts the new unrealistic corrugated steel sheeted buildings which are supposed to represent our solders,   no, no, and no, keep the respect, and let honer them at least what they are fighting and representing for us the english people who love our country and all who makes us a great place to live!
